sentences.sContent: I always think of many things abed .
sentences.sContent_eng: I always think of many things abed .
sentences.sCn: 我总是想很多事情躺在床上。

sentences.sContent: Each morning they lay abed till the breakfast-bell.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each morning they lay abed till the breakfast-bell.
sentences.sCn: 每天早晨他们都躺在床上直到早餐铃响。
